name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving unauthorized PowerShell script execution across multiple hosts.

parallel--b92e5a4c-00ee-40a0-993f-9f5a9b.name: Execute Parallel Actions
parallel--b92e5a4c-00ee-40a0-993f-9f5a9b.description: Run mitigations in parallel to address the incident quickly.

action--d7f31efa-a9cd-429e-9332-1c00c60e.name: Terminate Unauthorized PowerShell Sessions
action--d7f31efa-a9cd-429e-9332-1c00c60e.description: Identify and terminate unauthorized PowerShell sessions.

action--ed9bb7a6-3ac7-42c3-bbd2-1d10832c.name: Scan for Malicious Scripts
action--ed9bb7a6-3ac7-42c3-bbd2-1d10832c.description: Scan all compromised hosts for malicious scripts.
action--ed9bb7a6-3ac7-42c3-bbd2-1d10832c.loop: repeat until scan results are clean

loop--f16b7fd4-2a98-42da-95a9-6a0d3d70d0.name: Isolate Compromised Hosts
loop--f16b7fd4-2a98-42da-95a9-6a0d3d70d0.description: Isolate each compromised host from the network.

action--c0cb816e-c869-4d9e-b7bf-79ba343a.name: Patch Systems with Latest Security Updates
action--c0cb816e-c869-4d9e-b7bf-79ba343a.description: Install the latest security updates on all systems.

commands.command: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y

action--52cf8f67-1e72-4e1b-8d4d-5b7a0429.name: Restore Sensitive Data from Backup
action--52cf8f67-1e72-4e1b-8d4d-5b7a0429.description: Restore data from backup to ensure data integrity.
